channel.title: CVE Feed for Perl Crypt::JWT -- Perl Crypt::JWT
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Perl Crypt::JWT -- Perl Crypt::JWT

item.title: CVE-2019-1010263|2024-08-05T03:07:18.361Z -- perl%20crypt%3A%3Ajwt -- perl%20crypt%3A%3Ajwt
item.description: Perl Crypt::JWT prior to 0.023 is affected by: Incorrect Access Control. The impact is: allow attackers to bypass authentication by providing a token by crafting with hmac(). The component is: JWT.pm, line 614. The attack vector is: network connectivity. The fixed version is: after commit b98a59b42ded9f9e51b2560410106207c2152d6c.
